04, 2001 12:40 AM

  Trinity::

  Trinit=
y started to shake when she saw Virgo aimed towards her head.

  "AHHHHHHHH=
HH!!!"

  Trinity jumped and ran towards cr's room.

ssage -----

Sunday, June 03, 2001 5:37 PM

    (Virgo stood there. Then she held her head. Everything was coming ba=
ck. A
    few seconds pass and Virgo looks at Trinity. Virgo follows Trinit=
y...)



    Virgo: I know something you don't know, brat...



    (Virgo =

at Trinity...)
